verses.name: Matthew 12:22
verses.text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil, blind, and dumb: and he healed him, insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw.

verses.name: Matthew 12:23
verses.text: And all the people were amazed, and said, Is not this the son of David?

verses.name: Matthew 12:24
verses.text: But when the Pharisees heard it, they said, This fellow doth not cast out devils, but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils.

verses.name: Matthew 12:25
verses.text: And Jesus knew their thoughts, and said unto them, Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand:
